subject: Basketball (College)
Football (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. cited Miami for a decade of violations in its men’s basketball and football programs, penalizing the university with three years’ probation and a loss of scholarships.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. cited Miami for a decade of violations in its men’s basketball and football programs, penalizing the university with three years’ probation and a loss of scholarships.
